snippet.title: Revita Refocused | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are happy to official reveal what was previously known as the "2.0 update", as "Revita Refocused".
A massive, free update that reworks many systems in the game as a response to all the feedback we have received, as well as adding a ton of new content.
"Revita Refocused" is currently slated to release in Fall 2023

You can buy Revita here:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1175460/Revita/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/revita-switch/
XBOX: https://www.xbox.com/fr-fr/games/store/revita/9p41trq6b538
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/fr-fr/concept/10006296

Join our Discord community! https://discord.com/invite/revita
